availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza Whitehead Harding in Harrison County, Kentucky, on May 1, 1837. Father of Elizabeth Harding, Sarah Harding, George Ann Harding, Margaret G. Harding, Joanna Harding, John W. Harding, William N. Harding, Louisa Harding, Emma W. Harding, and Madora Harding. Farmer in Harrison County in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Harrison County in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Harrison County in 1860.
